collection:
This Privacy Policy outlines our
commitments and your rights regarding the collection, use, and protection of
your personal information.

Information Collection  
What We Collect:  
  
We collect information necessary to provide our services, such as queries and
interaction data with our ChatGPT assistant.

We do not collect personal identification information unless voluntarily
provided by you for specific services.

How We Collect:  
  
Information is collected through your interaction with our services and
voluntary disclosures.

[Youtube Trends around The World] does not collect, share, nor use personally
identifiable data in any way.
sharing:
[Youtube Trends around The World] does not collect, share, nor use personally

Data Sharing and Disclosure  
[Youtube Trends around The World] does not share any user information with
third parties.

We do not disclose user information publicly or to any external entities,
except as required by law.
